item.title: Retrieving events from SQL Server
item.author: Author
item.description: Overview When executing some long-running server side processes on a SQL Server (Stored procedures or functions) would be nice to get progress messages, and why not, a percent value in order to show a progress bar in our application. In the past I’ve used different techniques to archive this, from SQL Assemblies for calling a SignalR server, to execute xp_cmdshell, and so many other esoteric ways. None of that solved the problem in an elegant way, but well, it worked… more or less…
